SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionCard
ActionCard class represents the class of cards which have special effect after played
Card
Card class is the superclass of all cards in Duo Card Game and acts as an abstract base class for NumberCard and ActionCard classes
CardGameMediator
CardGameMediator class is responsible for managing Duo Card Game and implements the mediator design pattern to reduce coupling among player objects
Color
Color enum that represents the color of cards in the Duo Card Game which are blue, green, red, and yellow.
DrawTwoCard
DrawTwoCard class triggers next player to draw two cards from deck when played
DuoCardGameApp
DuoCardGameApp class acts as the driver class to run the application it creates an instance of CardGameMediator object to run the simulation
FileIO
FileIO class performs reading and writing operations for CSV file at the beginning and at the end of rounds.
NumberCard
NumberCard class does not impose any special effect and each instance is represented with a specific number
Player
Player class which represents the player with specific name, score and cards he/she playes
ReverseCard
ReverseCard changes direction of game from either "left" to "right" or "right" to "left"
ShuffleHandsCard
ShuffleHandsCard class causes all players hands to be shuffled when played
SkipCard
SkipCard skips the next player who will normally play and continious with the the subsequent player
WildCard
WildCard changes color of game according to color of the card which occurs most frequent.
WildDrawFourCard
WildDrawFourCard changes the color of the game according to color of the card that occurs most frequently and forces next player to draw four cards from draw pile
